text:
@CityofJax @lennycurry Make it mandatory for grocery stores & salons. Require every public building to post 1 of 2 signs:

"Nose/mouth covering is mandatory for everyone entering this building"
or
"Nose/mouth covering is NOT mandatory. Enter at your own risk as the coronavirus is extremely contagious"
